channel.title: Comments on: Dessert First: Making Writing Indulgent Again
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: NaNo is the Hour of Our Discontent – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: NaNo is the Hour of Our Discontent – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] Should it be the project that’s objectively closer to being coherently done and plotted out? Should it be the one I’m most excited to see as a finished product? Should it be the one I consider to be the most marketable? […]
